definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)

sentences.english: The copolymer was wet spun to get flame-retardant fiber.
sentences.chinese: 將共聚物通過溼法紡絲，得到了阻燃纖維。

sentences.english: Standard linings are supplied in either 2oz or 4oz machine washable FR polyester.
sentences.chinese: 提供標準的內膽是在任一盎司或阻燃聚酯安士機洗。

sentences.english: Asbestos, used as a flame retardant, can cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 石棉用於阻燃劑，可能導致癌症。

sentences.english: Low smoke, zero halogen flame retardant sheath.
sentences.chinese: 低煙無滷阻燃護套，環保。

sentences.english: With flame retardant more than 5 parts added, the flammability of the board is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 添加5份以上的阻燃劑，可以大大降低板材的燃燒性。

sentences.english: Vinyl chloride-acrylonitrile copolymer fiber is an important raw material for producing fire-retardant fabric in China.
sentences.chinese: 腈氯綸纖維是我國生產阻燃織物的主要纖維品種。

sentences.english: Copper conductor XLPE insulated low-smoke and non-halo sheathed Flame-retardant power cable.
sentences.chinese: 銅芯交聯聚乙烯絕緣低煙無滷護套阻燃電力電纜。

sentences.english: SCAME cable glands are made in self-extinguishing thermoplastic material and designed for cabling and installations in electric boards.
sentences.chinese: 它由阻燃性熱塑材料製成，用於電板的佈線和安裝。

sentences.english: Low smoke, zero halogen and flame retardant sheath.
sentences.chinese: 低煙無滷阻燃護套，環保。

sentences.english: The products are made of metallized polypropylene film, seal with epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 金屬化聚丙烯膜卷繞而成，阻燃環氧樹脂封封。

sentences.english: The weight of residual char increased with the addition of MH, which also improved the flame retardance of PA6.
sentences.chinese: MH提高了體系燃燒的成炭率，有利於阻燃性的提高。

sentences.english: Sabci Lexan More robust design of standard 900 series flame retardant grade.
sentences.chinese: 更強大的設計標準900系列阻燃等級。

sentences.english: In this paper, the method of directly synthesizing hexabromobenzene with benzene and bromine was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了利用苯直接溴代合成阻燃劑六溴苯的方法。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a two-stage screw for injection moulding flame-retardant ABS.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了成型阻燃ABS二段式注射螺桿。

sentences.english: The mechanism of the surface colouration of the flame-retardant nylon product and its application are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹阻燃尼龍製品表面着色的機理及其應用。

sentences.english: This product is highly elastic, and flexibility, abrasion resistance and flame resistance.
sentences.chinese: 本產品具有很強的彈力性，伸縮性，耐磨性和阻燃性。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
